resourceTemplates.name: filtered-devices
resourceTemplates.title: Filtered devices
resourceTemplates.description: Flexible device listing with custom filter. Examples: startswith(deviceName,'LAP-'), operatingSystem eq 'Windows', userPrincipalName eq 'user@contoso.com', serialNumber eq 'XYZ123', complianceState ne 'compliant'. Replace {deviceFilter}.

resourceTemplates.name: device-details
resourceTemplates.title: Device details by ID
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve the full detail card of a managed device by Intune device ID.

resourceTemplates.name: user-managed-devices
resourceTemplates.title: Devices per user
resourceTemplates.description: All managed devices for a specific user (ID or UPN).

resourceTemplates.name: device-by-serial
resourceTemplates.title: Find device by serial
resourceTemplates.description: Search a device by its serial number.

resourceTemplates.name: autopilot-by-serial
resourceTemplates.title: Autopilot by serial
resourceTemplates.description: Find Autopilot identity for a specific serial number.

resourceTemplates.name: user-noncompliant-devices
resourceTemplates.title: User’s non-compliant devices
resourceTemplates.description: Quick triage: all non-compliant devices of a specific user.

resourceTemplates.name: stale-devices-since
resourceTemplates.title: Devices not synced since {isoDateTime}
resourceTemplates.description: Find stale devices that have not synced since an ISO 8601 datetime (e.g., 2025-08-01T00:00:00Z).

resourceTemplates.name: devices-by-os-and-version
resourceTemplates.title: Devices by OS and version
resourceTemplates.description: Filter devices by OS and version, e.g., Windows/10, iOS/17, Android/14, macOS/14. Replace {os} and {majorMinor}.

resourceTemplates.name: devices-by-management-agent
resourceTemplates.title: Devices by management agent
resourceTemplates.description: Segment devices by management agent (examples: microsoftSense, intuneClient, eas, mdm). Replace {agent}.

resourceTemplates.name: devices-by-name-prefix
resourceTemplates.title: Devices by name prefix
resourceTemplates.description: Find directory devices where the displayName starts with a given prefix (e.g., 'LAP-').

resourceTemplates.name: device-details
resourceTemplates.title: Device details by ID
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve Entra ID device object details by object ID or deviceId.

resourceTemplates.name: device-by-azuread-id
resourceTemplates.title: Find device by Azure AD deviceId
resourceTemplates.description: Locate a device in Entra ID using its Azure AD deviceId (GUID).

resourceTemplates.name: disabled-devices
resourceTemplates.title: Disabled devices
resourceTemplates.description: List all devices in Entra ID that are currently disabled.

resourceTemplates.name: stale-entra-devices
resourceTemplates.title: Devices stale since {isoDateTime}
resourceTemplates.description: Find Entra ID devices that haven’t signed in since the given ISO 8601 datetime.
